channel.title: RuneLands
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25q955d.png[/img][/center] [center]This server is based off of my previous Project: U-Rune. I am in the process of clearing it, and writing it to make it have 100x the potential of the previous server.[/center]
[b]Packaging[/b] [url=http://i43.tinypic.com/2n1ro1.jpg]main directory[/url] [url=http://i39.tinypic.com/2a7efdz.jpg]/src/[/url] [url=http://i40.tinypic.com/w7lf6s.jpg]/src/bin/[/url] [url=http://i41.tinypic.com/2ppwow8.jpg]/src/bin/conf/[/url] [url=http://i42.tinypic.com/2dgokg8.jpg]/src/bin/dat/[/url] [url=http://i40.tinypic.com/bj65w1.jpg]/src/misc/[/url] [url=http://i41.tinypic.com/149s5qh.jpg]/src/npc/[/url] [url=http://i43.tinypic.com/zt7znr.jpg]/src/player/[/url] [url=http://i41.tinypic.com/2hfm8li.jpg]/src/player/packets[/url]
[b]In-game view[/b] [url=http://i43.tinypic.com/2vx0myv.png]Login (July-04-09)[/url] - [url=http://i28.tinypic.com/vcqbyx.png]Login (July-11-09)[/url] [url=http://i30.tinypic.com/2v82wsi.png]Bank (July-11-09)[/url] [url=http://i30.tinypic.com/dq3vw4.png]Welcome screen (July-11-09)[/url] - [url=http://i31.tinypic.com/kf0du1.png]Combat (July-13-09)[/url]
[b]Update logs[/b] July-09-09 - Character file reading/writing. July-09-09 - Working 'Invalid username or password'. July-09-09 - Working commands. - July-11-09 - Character files now fully read/write. July-11-09 - Working on getting buttons working. July-11-09 - Perfect PvE. July-11-09 - Fixing a few kinks in PvP. - July-13-09 - Perfect teleporting. July-13-09 - Attack styles save/load.
[b]Bug notes - To keep myself on track.[/b] [s]July-04-09 - NPC twitching.[/s] - [s]July-05-09 - Character files not loading.[/s] - [s]July-09-09 - Character looks don't load (because they don't save).[/s] [s]July-09-09 - Character looks load, but not correctly. ie; causing client errors.[/s] -

item.title: RuneLands
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I suppose Player vs Player is pretty basic, NPC combat is much more better though
PvP is just basic, great, and awesome, attack styles load and save, death on 0 HP, player facing, just needs player following to be perfect (and a few other things)

Read full topic

item.title: RuneLands
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Got saving and loading attack styles, so you won’t accidentally login and train attack on a defence pure, or something of that. I also added the following:

  • Experience in combat.
  • Perfect teleportation.
  • Somewhat of tutorial island.

You can see a picture of combat above in the main post.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneLands
item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:16, topic:286986”][quote author=eatcheese link=topic=379530.msg2863481#msg2863481 date=1247320682]
well there are not many private servers that can make money off a runescape source without there asses getting sued
[/quote]GF IKRAM.
He sells Party Hats and other rares for RuneScape accounts and PayPal money on his server (RuneHex 2.0) - Yeah, and I thought to become sponsored you couldn’t sell stuff on your server…[/quote]

Lol he won’t get sued, jagex won’t find out since so many people do that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

Nice dialog directory man, I really like how organized it is. If you release this I bet many noobs will instantly get sloppy with it.

Oh, noobs like you? I know.

item.title: RuneLands
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]This server is based off of my previous Project: U-Rune. I am in the process of clearing it, and writing it to make it have 100x the potential of the previous server.[/center]

Packaging
main directory
/src/
/src/bin/
/src/bin/conf/
/src/bin/dat/
/src/misc/
/src/npc/
/src/player/

In-game view
Login (July-04-09)

Login (July-11-09)
Bank (July-11-09)
Welcome screen (July-11-09)

Combat (July-13-09)

Update logs
July-09-09 - Character file reading/writing.
July-09-09 - Working ‘Invalid username or password’.
July-09-09 - Working commands.

July-11-09 - Character files now fully read/write.
July-11-09 - Working on getting buttons working.
July-11-09 - Perfect PvE.
July-11-09 - Fixing a few kinks in PvP.

July-13-09 - Perfect teleporting.
July-13-09 - Attack styles save/load.

Bug notes - To keep myself on track.
July-04-09 - NPC twitching.

July-05-09 - Character files not loading.

July-09-09 - Character looks don’t load (because they don’t save).
July-09-09 - Character looks load, but not correctly. ie; causing client errors.
